title: Express.js
description: Express.js, a widely used Node.js framework, handles different HTTP methods in an API route.

title: Sequelize
description: I've learned how to relate data between SQL tables using Sequelize associations and how to model one-to-one, one-to-many, and many-to-many relationships.

title: Handlebars
description: Handlebars.js is a template engine used to render client-side aspects of the application.This is the View layer in the MVC framework.

title: Node.js
description: Node.js is an implementation of the V8 JavaScript engine without Chrome. It allows developers to write server-side code using JavaScript!

title: MySQL
description: MySQL is considered the most reliable, scaleable, and developer-friendly open source relational database management system. It powers the back end of many of the popular social, streaming, and service web applications.

title: MVC
description: The Model-View-Controller (MVC) paradigm is an architectural pattern that structures a codebase in three distinct sections, according to a software design philosophy known as the separation of concerns
